main_definition: The abbreviation 'hrs' stands for 'hours', representing a unit of time used to quantify the duration or span of an event, task, or activity.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Unit of time equal to 60 minutes
meanings_and_examples.example: The meeting will last for 2 hrs.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Indicating a period or duration in hours on a resume or job application
meanings_and_examples.example: Experience: 3 years of customer service work, including weekends and holidays (180 hrs).

meanings_and_examples.definition: Representing the number of hours worked at a particular job or task
meanings_and_examples.example: I have been working in this company for 45 hrs per week.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Refers to 'hours' as a unit of measurement in various contexts, such as exercise duration or study time
meanings_and_examples.example: She exercises for 1 hr every day after work.
